title: Volibear is the champion equivalent to herpies.
body:
You catch him from messing around with your enemy top laner without wards.

And then you see him show up more and more and in more places than before.

You quickly realise that you cant get him off you by yourself by any means you scrub him off and even though he appears to be gone, hes there, hot on your trail waiting to be on you again.

You request for aid but you realise the adc has cut off your supportcare and your gp/10 payments arent enough to warrant them disobeying his highness.

So you struggle to find some form of home remedy, maybe rylais? its cold right, that should slow him down, fuck no it just makes him angrier.

Ok morellos, theres gotta be some spell to zap him away, would work if you would get him below half health before he explodes you with his 100% free damage scaling.

so slowly you succumb to your fate, you can no longer group with your team as you only bring volibear upon them aswell.

So you live a sad lonely life defending the inhib towers and never leaving base because whats the point if you cant group.

So yeah voli is herpes, pls nerf.
